headline: Assessing Entergy’s Valuation After Strong 2025 Rally and Ongoing Grid Investment Plans
summary: If you have been wondering whether Entergy is still good value after its long run up, you are not alone. That is exactly the question this breakdown will tackle. Despite dipping about 1.0% over the last week and 3.9% over the past month, Entergy is still up roughly 23.8% year to date and 29.8% over the last year, building on an impressive multi year climb of more than 120% over five years. Those gains have come as investors refocus on regulated utilities with stable cash flows and as the...
